items.content_html: KaliPHP is a fast, lightweight PHP framework. In an age where frameworks are a dime a dozen, We believe that KaliPHP will stand out in the crowd. It will do this by combining all the things you love about the great frameworks out there, while getting rid of the bad.

items.content_html: GridMaster is a lightweight tool that simplifies creating responsive CSS grid layouts. It allows developers to generate flexible grids with customizable rows, columns, and gaps, and supports responsive breakpoints for different screen sizes. GridMaster automates the tedious task of writing grid CSS, saving you time and effort.
items.title: turk-911/Grid-Matic: GridMaster is a lightweight tool that simplifies creating responsive CSS grid layouts. It allows developers to generate flexible grids with customizable rows, columns, and gaps, and supports responsive breakpoints for different screen sizes. GridMaster automates the tedious task of writing grid CSS, saving you time and effort.

items.content_html: Join is a lightweight and flexible Kanban board application designed to help teams and individuals manage tasks and projects efficiently. Inspired by Trello, Join enables you to create boards, lists, and cards to organize your workflow seamlessly.
